name: Lessons from Open-Source Game Development
description: This talk will chronicle the development journey of 0 A.D., a free open-source game reminiscent of Age of Empires. Lessons for the future development of Autonomous Worlds will be presented across areas such as ownership, cheating, modding, customization, communication, and community management.
